articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Rare instance of Indo-Pak partnership props up Sussex
articles.description: India's Cheteshwar Pujara scored his second double hundred in three matches on Saturday as he shared a century stand with Pakistan's Mohammad Rizwan for English county Sussex.

articles.title: Russia says Ukraine shells its own civilians; some evacuations in Mariupol
